title: Create VitePress documentation site for repo projects
description: Build a documentation website using VitePress to describe the three projects (agix, ainit, worldtime) in this monorepo. The site should include a landing page, project overviews, and detailed docs for each tool.
acceptance_criteria: VitePress project initialized in docs/ directory
Landing page with hero section and feature cards
Documentation pages for agix, ainit, and worldtime
Local dev server and build working correctly
